title: Kanne Kalaimane Lyrics Moondram Pirai Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Kanne Kalaimaanae
kanni mayilena
kandaen unai naaney

andhi pagal
unai naan parkien
aandavanai idhaithana
ketkiren

raariraroae oraariroe
raariraroae oraariroe

Kanne Kalaimaanae
kanni mayilena
kandaen unai naaney

Oomai endraal
oruvagai amaidhi
aezhai endraal
adhil oru amaidhi

neeyo kilippedu
panpaadum aanandha
kyil paedu

yeno deivam 
sadhi seidhadhu
pedhai pola
vidhi seidhadhu

Kanne Kalaimaanae ..

kadhal kondaen
kanavinai valarthaen
kanmani unai naan
karuthinil niraithaen

unakae uyiraanen
ennaalum enai nee
maravaadhe

neeyillaamal 
edhu nimmadhi
neethaan ini
en sannidhi

Kanne Kalaimaanae ..
